/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG  -shared -Wl,-soname,libpango_scene.so -o libpango_scene.so CMakeFiles/pango_scene.dir/components/pango_scene/src/renderable.cpp.o  -Wl,-rpath,/home/liam/dev/rbd/addons/Pangolin/build: libpango_opengl.so libpango_image.so libpango_core.so -lrt -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so
